name: (In development) Full body controller - Prototype/Showcase
description:
Hereby presenting my full body fps controller made with unity. For now this is a prototype for movement and getting a feel for how the controller responds and acts.

The controller will be used to create a multiplayer survival game with pvp and pave elements. 

I would love some feedback on the controller! 

Ps. Before exiting the menu be sure to close all open tabs :). Can be played with a controller aswell!
